body.name: NUROUM C10 HD 1080P Conference Webcam, Video Conference Camera with Mic and Speaker, All-in-1 Ultra Wide-Angle 90° Webcam with Microphone, 10ft Voice Pickup, AI Noise-Cancellation, USB Plug&Play
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 29 mins
features: 【The Video Conferencing That Works & Affordable & Portable】An Ultra wide-angle 90° webcam that enables Full HD 1080p video calls, a microphones array with 10ft voice pickup radius, and a customized loudspeaker all in one sleek & ultra-compact device, that’s Nuroum C10 conference camera! Switch to a better-off experience for your work from home, remote learning, or small team online/hybrid collaboration, huddle space meetings, today!

【AI-empowered Mics, Voice-optimized Speaker】Its 360° & up-to 10ft radius voice pickup capacity means you can host as many as 10 participants at once. Smart noise suppression, echo-cancellation, and optimized duplex two-way communication make sure every meeting attendee can be heard with phenomenal clarity, thanks to the AI-based patented audio algorithm & 4-element microphones array. The speaker is tuned to highlight people's voices and enables distortionless and crisp sound even in high volume.

【Easy Setup, Touch Buttons】Driver-free, Plug & Play & Power via one single USB cable, which is included and organized underneath the base. No power adaptor required. Mute the camera or mics with one touch. The ring LED indicator shows real-time status, so your privacy is always under control. Not only lightweight & portable but also the matte-finished, porcelain white body is covered by special substance to prevent fingerprints and other unwanted spots and maintain its alabaster-like appearance.

【Diverse Compatibility】Compatible with desktop or laptop computers w/ Windows, macOS, Linux, ChromeOS, and Android (device depends). Works with conferencing platforms like Zoom, Skype, Slack, Google Hangouts/Classroom, GoToMeeting, BlueJeans, Twitch/Facebook Live/xsplit/OBS, etc. Supported resolutions at 1920x1080/ 1280x720/ 640x480. Encoding formats include JPEG, MJPG, YUY2, H.264

【Regular Firmware Updatings】 Bring constant performance promotions (voice pickup, speaker EQ, etc.) and new functions. Apps is available for both Windows & macOS on Nuroum official website! As fast as next-day delivery. Lightning-fast replacement if the product is damaged during shipment. Questions or requests? We respond fast and are always in your interest.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.0 4.0 out of 5 stars 199 ratings 4.0 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page The USB webcam has a glass lens with a 2MP CMOS image sensor making the videos clear and impressive. C10 video conference webcam system can output clear and sharp images and videos in 1080P@30fps. The FOV of 90° is especially designed for individuals and small teams online/hybrid collaboration. Next page 1 2MP CMOS Sensor 2 1080P Full HD Images 3 90° Wide Angle 4 Image Setting

AI-empowered Noise Cancellation 4 built-in noise cancelling mics with our industry-leading AI audio algorithm can filter out the ambient noise. So the people on the other end can only hear your voice, not the noise around you. Full Duplex Technology Full duplex audio processing technology allows multiple people to talk at the same time without missing a word increasing the communication efficiency during hybrid work. 3M Voice Pickup & Balance Range C10 webcam comes with the Automatic Gain Control technology. AGC allows the voice from all directions to be clearly picked up within a distance of 3m/13ft. In this radius, you can move freely.
Previous page Next page 1 For Personal Conference 2 For Moving Office 3 For Online Learning 4 For Small Workgroups

Compact and Portable All-in-1 Solution You do not need so many devices to have a quality video meeting any more. With one cable connected to your PC, you could have microphone, speaker and wide-angle camera all-in-one. A compact, mobile, and useful solution to hybrid meetings where you have some online and some in the room. Wide Compatibility The USB webcam with speaker and microphone is compatible with desktop and laptop computers w/Windows/MacOS/Linux. It works seamlessly with polular conferencing platforms like Zoom/Teams/Webex/Skype etc. Ideal for video conferencing, home office, moving office, online teaching, online learning etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small Business Virtual Meetings
reviews.reviewText: OMG! I am not even joking. This conference camera is truly "plug-n-play" and the camera works wonderfully. The sound is very clear. I have a small business so I did not need a tilt/rotate camera, but nuroum has conference cameras that are more advanced than this. I just put a snapshot of one of my virtual classes. I think the quality is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great conference video/sound
reviews.reviewText: Loved the product but ordered in that I thought had AI with it. This version was great with Zoom and my Mac Mini but did not do what I needed so it was sent back. Crystal clear video and sound and impressive at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look good and sound great
reviews.reviewText: Got this to try for a meeting where there is a group together and others on zoom. No more passing around the laptop to the speaker in order to be seen and heard. Now five of us around the table can be seen and heard without passing around the laptop, being a contortionist or shouting to be heard. Clarity is great on all fronts for the group at the table and those joining remotely. The thing looks really cool as well. Bought one to try for the business meeting and now got a second one for my personal use. Did I mention how easy it is to set up and get running? It is really simple and straight forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like the wide view for video, much better than my computer. Very clear video! And that’s the extent of the positives I’ve experienced. The speaker and mic are not as great as it seems in the reviews. I have two separate ones for two different groups (5-8 people and 10-15people) and those who are virtual are constantly saying they can only hear when people are standing next to it. The speaker on full volume is really quiet. The cord is not long enough for a conference room and presentation setting. Having to plug into the computer, it’s great if it’s being operated remotely but if that’s not an option, the speaker can’t be seen in addition to all meeting attendees. It would be nice to have a longer cord or a wireless option so the presenter can operate the computer/presentation and position the camera so they are still seen in addition to meeting attendees. Overall this is a great camera for family zoom sessions with only 2-3people. Not a conference meeting setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am use at my office
reviews.reviewText: It is very user-friendly ,easy to install.I use it very day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stops working on the time
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is good., The microphone works fine. The lens has a really big angle which is good for a conference meeting or group meeting. It is not good for a single personal computer.My complaint is that the unit stops working all the time when I start Zoom or Teams meetings, almost every time. I need to unplug and plug the unit in to make it work. I need to do this a few times a day. Once it is working, it is fine. It is at the beginning of the meeting when this happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice option for low cost group meetings.
reviews.reviewText: The audio was a bit soft, even with the volume levels maxed. The picture quality and device are very nice. The one thing I recommend is getting a USB extension cable. The included cable winds up on the bottom of the unit for concealed storage, but is too short for most meeting arrangements. I have not tested with any USB extension cables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adequate product, clueless company
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use with my Mac. And the Mac recognizes it. But the first thing in the manual we are instructed to do, once it's plugged in, is to update the firmware. Sadly, the firmware update is ONLY FOR WINDOWS.I decided that I would contact the company. No luck there! They claim that my eMail address is in an invalid format. It's not... Your web programmer just doesn't know a valid address from an invalid one. So no way to contact them.Consequently, instead of possibly being great, I have to say that the product is adequate.
excelente producto cumple con las espectativas, buen diseño buena calidad de imagen
